'''2.1.2481''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.2480''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.2482''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 21, 2019.

== Additions ==
* Added a function, which checks the file, when a startup fails. (macOS)
* Updated translations.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-4934}}: Launcher forgets login token when switching Wi-Fi networks.
* {{bug|MCL-9071}}: Launcher requires <code>youtube.com</code>.
* {{bug|MCL-10527}}: <code>.exe</code> won't start the launcher if <code>.minecraft</code> folder is moved using a symbolic link.
* {{bug|MCL-10588}}: Launcher <code>.deb</code> dependency conflict.
